Nightstrike::

"Hey Spattercasnnon... do you think that those treachorus la=
dies have survived???" he said while he continued flying towards Earth
  --=
--- Original Message ----- 
  From: robert riley 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.=
com 
  Sent: Tuesday, July 12, 2005 1:04 AM
  Subject: Re: The Awakened


 =
 Injustice/ Splattercannon:

  Injustice scoffed and looked to Earth.  He w=
as down there somewhere, hiding....waiting for him.  And when they met, he =
would make sure he was destroyed.

  "I'll get you next we meet.  You won't=
 be rid of me so easily."

  Splattercannon transformed and flew after Nigh=
tstrike, preparing his weapons for a possible battle.

  Airly <airly2002@h=
otmail.com> wrote:
    Nightstrike:

    "I guess that we... can do some me=
ss in their industries"and looking to Spattercannon and Injustice he smirke=
d"Just to tell them that we're in neiborghood"


    Nightstrike took off a=
nd flew towards Earth
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: Nic 
=
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Saturday, July 09, 2005 1:33 =
PM
      Subject: Re: The Awakened


      Vorpal: Hunting someone down? No=
, there would be too much work even
      for us Minions. No, we have been =
outnumbered in our sleep, something
      Master Unicron had not planned. W=
e cannot hunt people down. We have to
      start a war, but we must do thi=
s in a methodical way.

      He ordered the reactivation of the section af=
ter Darkfate was out of
      it, then summoned a holoprojection of Earth.
=

      Vorpal: I need you all to scout. We need to establish how well
     =
 defended their production facilities are in order to plan our attacks.
   =
   There are two places where you must NEVER go though...

      He brought=
 up images of the Cryonosis Tower and of Mount Olympus.

      Vorpal: Thes=
e are two of the Cybertronians' most heavily defended
      positions. Cryo=
nosis is a monitoring station that seems to be watching
      us. Eventuall=
y, we will have to take it out, but not yet. Olympus
      Complex, on the =
other hand, is the dedicated central military
      facility. It is a place=
 so well defended we must not hope to leave
      there unscathed. For now,=
 though, we will concentrate on their orbital
      facilities. Go, and rep=
ort all that you see! 

      --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly=
2002@h...> wrote:
      > Nightstrike/Darkfate:
      > 
      > "I don't h=
ave any problem... and after this, I guess that Darkfate
      neither"repl=
ied Nightstrike"What important thing will do?? hunt down
      thore treach=
erous laidies??? they are a danger that should be
      eradicated as soon =
as possible, I guess that MAster Unicron told ya bout"
      >   ----- Orig=
inal Message ----- 
      >   From: Nic 
      >   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.c=
om 
      >   Sent: Saturday, July 09, 2005 12:30 PM
      >   Subject: Re:=
 The Awakened
      > 
      > 
      >   Vorpal: You are right. Do you hea=
r that, Darkfate? You owe 
      >   Nightstrike your life now! Drones, dea=
ctivate this section.
      > 
      >   The electrical tension suddenly st=
opped, allowing Darkfate to get 
      >   out of the trench.
      > 
    =
  >   Vorpal: Can we finally stop bickering about my leadership and get 
  =
    >   down to important things, now?






  "HA!  Is that all you got?  =
You boasted such power, such skill!  Where is your power and skill now?  Yo=
u disappoint me, ha ha ha haa!"
